title: How Vendia leverages the AWS CDK to dynamically provision cloud infrastructure
description: How Vendia uses the AWS Cloud Development Kit (AWS CDK) and AWS CloudFormation to dynamically provision cloud infrastructure on behalf of their customers.

title: 10 Essential Practices for Building Software for Cloud Scale
description: Learn the technical practices, Lean product development, Lean management, and culture and work environment approaches in DORA are applicable no matter the intended scale of your software system.
